history.content: Hi! I'm Ali and I'm interested in studying Intelligent Robotics at MMU.

ACE6143 — Data Communications and Networking
Credits: 3
Prerequisite: None
What courses will I take in my first year?

AAP6136 — Final Year Project 1
Credits: 3
Prerequisite: None
What is Computer and Program Design about?

Computer and Program Design (ACE6143) covers computer organization, architecture, and design principles at different levels of abstraction. It includes topics like microprocessor architecture, microcontroller programming, and hardware interfacing.
